scripts.watch: concurrent -p command 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch-js' 'npm run watch-less'
scripts.watch-less: npm run build-less && chokidar '**/*.less' './src/styles/**/*.css' -c 'npm run build-less'
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-styles
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify ./src/scripts/main.js -t babelify -o ./src/bundle.js && npm run minify-js
scripts.build-styles: npm run build-styles-dev && npm run minify-css
scripts.build-styles-dev: npm run build-less && npm run postcss
scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
